name: Smartlingual
slogan: Accurate and fast medical translation combing human expertise with machine translation
description: A cloud-based medical translation platform integrating Deep Learning, data science and the latest advances in language technology.

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description:
Smartlingual is looking for a strong and dynamic Software Engineer to join our tech team – to help create and launch our translation platform and develop the products and services that we will deliver from this platform for both external and internal clients.  
We need someone who has a strong DevOps mindset, who has a clear understanding of CI, CD, Unit Tests, and Application monitoring, and what tools to use – and from the get go incorporates this "way of working" into everything they and the team do.

Key Responsibilities:
•	Architect, integrate and build our translation platform
•	Design & develop new projects
•	Research, evaluate and adopt new technologies with a right tool for the job mentality
•	Prototype, fail rapidly and iterate.
•	Focus on both speed of delivery and quality, with suitable pragmatism

Required Skills:
•	Javascript – ideally previously worked with VueJS 
•	Python – with at least 2 years’ experience
•	Django framework
•	SQL

Good to know:
•	Docker
•	RabbitMQ
•	AI/Deep learning
•	A second spoken language would be a plus

 To apply:
Please send your CV and cover letter to info@smartlingual.com, with the subject line ‘Full Stack Developer’.
